sqlMap.select: select userid, username, p.usertype, u.perid, p.pername, u.corpid, c.corpname, c.ismain from users u inner join permission p on u.perid = p.perid inner join corporation c on u.corpid = c.corpid where loginid = '$loginid$' and passwd = md5('$passwd$')

select a.userid, a.username, a.loginid, a.corpid, c.corpname, a.perid, p.pername, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, b.username as updateusername, c.corptype, i.isname as corptypename, i.text from users a left join corporation c on a.corpid = c.corpid left join permission p on p.perid = a.perid left join users b on a.updateuser = b.userid left join code_instance i on i.code = 'corptype' and c.corptype = i.isid where a.stat = 1 and a.userid = $userid$ and a.corpid = $corpid$ and c.corptype = $corptype$ and a.perid = $perid$ and p.usertype = 'M' $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' order by $order_str$ , a.userid desc
limit $skip$,$max$ ;

select count(*) from users a
left join corporation c on a.corpid = c.corpid left join permission p on p.perid = a.perid
where a.stat = 1 and a.loginid = '$loginid$' and a.userid = $userid$ and a.userid != $not_userid$ and a.corpid = $corpid$ and a.perid = $perid$ and a.ismgr = $ismgr$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'
select perid, pername from permission where stat = 1
select count(*) from permission a where stat = 1 and pername = #pername# and a.perid != $not_perid$
select menu_id, menu_name, writeflag, subflag from web_menu order by idx

select x.*, ifnull(y.menu_val,0) as menu_val, (ifnull(y.menu_val,0) & svalue) as ischoice from (select b.perid, b.pername, a.menu_id, a.menu_name, a.menu_schema, isname, a.idx, c.isid as svalue, c.idx as idx2 from permission b, web_menu a left join code_instance c on c.code = 'menu_schema' and (a.menu_schema & c.isid) > 0 where b.stat = 1 ) x left join permission_menu y on x.menu_id = y.menu_id and x.perid = y.perid order by x.perid, x.idx, idx2

select x.*, (ifnull(y.menu_val,0) & svalue) as ischoice from (select a.`menu_id`, a.`menu_name`, isname, c.isid as svalue from web_menu a left join code_instance c on c.`code` = 'menu_schema' and (a.menu_schema & c.isid) > 0 order by a.idx, c.idx ) x left join permission_menu y on x.menu_id = y.menu_id and y.perid = #perid#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into adsrv.permission (perid, pername, usertype, stat, updatedate, updateuser) values (0, '$pername$', '$usertype$', 1, $updatedate$, $updateuser$);
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

insert into adsrv.permission_menu (perid, menu_id, menu_val, stat)
( #List[].perid# , #List[].menu_id# , #List[].menu_val# , 1 )
sqlMap.update: update permission set pername = '$pername$', stat = $stat$, updatedate = $updatedate$, updateuser = $updateuser$ where perid = $perid$
update permission_menu set stat = 0 where perid = $perid$
sqlMap.delete: delete from permission_menu where perid = $perid$ and stat = 0
sqlMap.select:
select a.corpname, a.corpid, a.corpname, a.corptype, p.isname as corptypename, a.insertdate, a.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, p.text from corporation a left join users u on a.insertuser = u.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'corptype' and a.corptype = p.isid where a.stat = 1 and a.corpid = $corpid$ and corptype = '$corptype$' $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' order by a.insertdate desc
limit $skip$,$max$ ;

select a.*, p.isname as corptypename, p.text, u.username as insertusername, u2.username as updateusername from (select a.corpname, a.corpid, a.corptype, a.insertdate, a.insertuser, a.updatedate, a.updateuser from corporation a where a.stat = 1 and a.corpid = $corpid$ )a left join users u on a.insertuser = u.userid left join users u2 on a.updateuser = u2.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'corptype' and a.corptype = p.isid
select count(*) from corporation a where a.stat = 1 and corpid != #not_corpid# and corptype = #corptype# and corpname = #corpname# $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'
sqlMap.insert: insert into adsrv.corporation (corpid, corpname, corptype, insertdate, insertuser, updatedate, updateuser, stat) values (0, #corpname#, #corptype#, #insertdate#, #insertuser#, #insertdate#, #insertuser#, 1 );
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.corporation set corpname = #corpname#, corptype = #corptype#, cate_sid = #cate_sid#, updatedate = #updatedate#, updateuser = #updateuser# where corpid = #corpid#;
sqlMap.insert: insert into adsrv.users (userid, loginid, passwd, username, perid, corpid, stat, ipstr, insertdate, insertuser, updatedate, updateuser) values (0, #loginid#, md5(#passwd#), #username#, #perid#, #corpid#, 1, #ipstr#, #insertdate#, #insertuser#, #insertdate#, #insertuser# );
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.users set loginid = #loginid#, passwd = md5(#passwd#), username = #username#, perid = #perid#, corpid = #corpid#, stat = #stat#, ipstr = #ipstr#, updatedate = #updatedate#, updateuser = #updateuser# where userid = #userid#
